name: Laser Rage (macha777)
description: Let's play a twin stick shooter arcade game called Laser Rage! INSERT COIN and score 12 Billion Points with 15 Lives on 1 Hit Death or die! Play with powerups like a shield, weapon spread, and bombs! Play Laser Rage on God mode and be invincible! Play Laser Rage with a wired video game controller on your computer. Listen to the futuristic music tracks. Press start anytime during gameplay to pause the game or to access the menu. Survive or DIE! Let's play Laser Rage!
